# interval_collapse { #genominterv.intervals.interval_collapse }

```python
genominterv.intervals.interval_collapse(interv)
```

This function computes the union of intervals in a single set.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**interv**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[pd](`pandas`).[DataFrame](`pandas.DataFrame`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Data frame with intervals.

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[pd](`pandas`).[DataFrame](`pandas.DataFrame`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A data frame with chr, start, end columns representing the union.
